title: Manage Shotcrete Application
description: An underground crew applies shotcrete (sprayed concrete) to the walls and roof of a new tunnel for ground support.

tasks.description: Verify that the rock surface has been properly scaled (cleared of loose rock) and prepared for shotcreting.
tasks.expected_outcome: The surface is confirmed to be ready.

tasks.description: Operate the robotic shotcrete sprayer to apply a layer of the required thickness (e.g., 100mm) to the rock surface.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shotcrete is applied evenly and to the correct thickness.

tasks.description: Take samples of the shotcrete during application to be tested for compressive strength to ensure it meets the design specification.
tasks.expected_outcome: QA/QC samples are taken and sent for testing.
